column5: Glory Be !!!...I was starting to suffer withdrawals myself...Good work all !!!
Thank God! I feel complete again!  :worthy:
Thank you.   Don't know if the shakes and sweats were from the DT's or the flu. Just glad you are up and running again.
*fist pump*
I was really worried about losing my post count
Great job getting things back up and running.  I'm sure there were a few , stressful moments and lots of hard work on your part.  I hope you know that it does not go unnoticed.  Thanks again!
Thanks, guys.  Good to be back.  OFC-withdrawal was beginning to get me down.  Didn't realize I was so addicted in these few months!  Os
Thank Goodness It was just a bad dream  Jose
Great to be back.  Thanks for the hard work guys. And yes,nice to have ya back Rick.
Thanks for the speedy recovery guys. Nice work! Good to see you on here Rick!

Soooo is it a coincident that as Rick gained weight that our bandwidth got bigger also.... I smell conspiracy... owell Thanks again for all of the hard work and the money spent on keeping this board going. I am proud of the owners that profit did not cause you to compromise the boards growth.   Art
Thanks folks for all your efforts to get us back communicating once again
allright, back to normal thx.
Good job guys and thanks for your efforts!!   ...I was wondering what was going on the past few days....

Thank god...  Bottom line...  our bandwidth use was bringing other boards down on the server we were using.  (Thats good, I guess...) So we had to be swithed to a different one with just us on it.  To be honest, our host just pulled the plug, without letting anyone know, even after it was done.  not good business practice as far as Im concerned.  Any way were moved to our new home.  Its gonna cost more, thats for sure, but at least we are back up and running.
Don't ever do that again!  Maybe we should remember times like these when we start complaining about things around here.  I'm sure there was lots of hard work put in.  Thanks.
thanks for all the hard work!  I love this place
Who was the host????
Whew, that was a long haul.  I appreciate you boys putting in the work to get us up and running again.  I know the frustrations you went through.  Nice to see we're back up and running  Joey

It is still our current host. This was a miscommunication between techs and management..we should have been warned first but were not. We have spent the last few days trying to get everything done. Good thing is we have our own server and can do whatever we want. They kept moving us from server to server trying to keep us online within our budget. It was no longer possible. Certainly we are not happy with the way it was handled and there will be more said between us and the host.
Good to see you got it all worked out TJ.  And Rick, real nice having you back too Bud !!
Glad to see all is back as usual. May I also add my appreciation to you guys for keeping the board up and running.
thank you
:thumbsup_anim:   WWWWWWWWWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!
Glad to see the board up and running again!!!  I thought I was going to have to go fishing there for a minute!
lol! Still too early.  Stick with the virtual fishing for now.
Anyway ... we're back up and running again.   Kept on checking here and there - just waiting and waiting.
I actually had to read "everyday news" yesterday while having my morning coffee and hated every minute of it.
Glad we are back up again. I had to spend quality time with the family last night!
I actually worked at work.  Thanks for the work to get things back online

I was having some serious OFC withdrawal.  Not to mention my boss at work was starting to get a bit worried about me as my work productivity went up by about 1000% over the last couple of days.  Dirk....
Thanks TJ and the gang  Real happy that we're back online Leechman
Dang! Now I can take out the coffee IV? LOL not that it helped. Welcome home kids!
Thanks guys. I don't think we say that often enough. Welcome back Rick!
this is sort of like you know you are addicted when.....  Glad its back and good to hear from you Rick
Thank you gentlemen!!!  Good to see back Rick.
Woo,close one.....sweatin bullets there for a couple days.. Yes,even us mods depend on this site to get us through our days....Its like we are a big community of OFC junkies around here
Glad you guys got things back up and running.......Good to have OFC back.
todays coffee is SOOOO much better for some reason, it must be now that the site is back.  Ahhhh...
